info.title: HNG-Cnnect API Documentation
info.description: API Documentation automatically generated by Docs Generate

post.description: Create a new Forgot Password with the provided data
Update an existing Reset Password with new data
Create a new Register with the provided data
Create a new Waitlist with the provided data

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Waitlist

post.description: Create a new user account. For company role, a company record will also be created.

post.summary: Authenticate or Register a user via Google-provided data
post.description: Handles Google-based authentication using the email and profile data sent from the frontend. If the email already exists, the user is logged in. If the email does not exist, a new account is created based on the provided `role` and optional `company_name`.

email.description: User email received from Google profile.

name.description: User full name from Google profile.

role.description: Required ONLY for new users. Ignored for existing users.

company_name.description: Required ONLY when signing up as a company. If not provided, backend infers from `name`.

existing-user-login.summary: Existing user login — no role required

200.description: Login success — existing user returned with token.

201.description: Signup success — new user created and returned with token.

400.description: Bad request — missing fields or invalid payload.

422.description: Validation failed — missing role for new user, invalid company signup data, etc.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token with user data.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Skill with pagination support

post.description: Create a new Skill with the provided data

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Skill

put.description: Update an existing Skill with new data

patch.description: Update an existing Skill with new data

delete.description: Permanently delete a Skill from the system

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Job Type with pagination support

post.description: Create a new Job Type with the provided data

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Job Type

put.description: Update an existing Job Type with new data

patch.description: Update an existing Job Type with new data

delete.description: Permanently delete a Job Type from the system

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Job with pagination support
Retrieve detailed information about a specific Job

delete.description: Permanently delete a Job from the system
